data.actual_result: The animating number and standard number overlap, causing only one digit to show for a short period.
data.expected_result: The second number on the counter will animate and tick up one.
data.short_description: Reacting with an emote which has been reacted with >10 times causes a buggy animation
data.steps_to_repro: - React to a message with an emote that has already been used to react at least 10 times
